item.title: A former Solana exec is taking a page out of Wall Street playbook to make global crypto trades faster
item.description: The goal is to reduce Solana‚Äôs growing geographic concentration in Europe and introduce multicast functionality.

item.title: Here‚Äôs what happened in crypto today
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: OKX Adopts Chainalysis Alterya to Stop Fraud Before It Happens
item.description: SAN JOSE (February 26, 2026) ‚Äì OKX and Chainalysis today announced an expansion of their relationship focused on proactive fraud‚Ä¶ The post OKX Adopts Chainalysis Alterya to Stop Fraud Before It Happens appeared first on Chainalysis .

item.title: Analysts reject Jane Street ‚Äò10 am dump‚Äô claims, say Bitcoin isn‚Äôt easily manipulated
item.description: Crypto traders blame Jane Street for a daily 10 am Bitcoin dip after a Terraform lawsuit claimed dubious trading practices, but analysts say timing matches broader risk repricing.

item.title: Trump family-backed miner American Bitcoin posts $59M quarterly loss
item.description: American Bitcoin posted a $59.5 million Q4 loss while its revenue rose and its Bitcoin stack topped 6,000 coins, as peers pivot to AI and sell down treasuries.

item.title: Crypto investigator ZachXBT alleges trading platform Axiom's employee conducted insider trading
item.description: ZachXBT.alleges a senior Axiom employee used internal dashboards to access private wallet data and track traders‚Äô activity, raising questions about potential insider trading.

item.title: CoinDesk 20 performance update: index falls 1.4% as all constituents trade lower
item.description: Aptos (APT) declined 11% and Aave (AAVE) dropped 6.6%, leading index lower from Wednesday.

item.title: Goliath Ventures CEO Arrested Over $328M Crypto ‚ÄòPonzi Scheme‚Äô
item.description: Christopher Alexander Delgado was charged on counts of wire fraud and money laundering that carry a maximum sentence of 30 years in prison.

item.title: MetaMask Crypto Debit Mastercard Launches Across United States
item.description: The Mastercard-powered MetaMask debit card is now rolling out access to all users across the United States.

item.title: MetaMask expands debit card across U.S. after year-long pilot
item.description: The card lets users spend digital assets directly from their self-custodial wallets at various merchants.

item.title: Decibel goes live on Aptos with a $58 million war chest and a secret weapon from Stripe's Bridge
item.description: After a testnet with 700,000 accounts and $50 million in pre-deposits, Decibel begins mainnet trading with an onchain order book and risk engine on Aptos.

item.title: Mastercard, MetaMask launch US crypto card, debuting in New York
item.description: MetaMask Card goes live in the US, with first-time availability across 49 states, including New York, following initial pilots over the past two years.

item.description: Cryptocurrency exchanges are moving to block scam-linked transfers before funds leave their platforms as fraud losses continue to climb.

item.title: How does Trump influence the price of Bitcoin?
item.description: US President Donald Trump has influenced cryptocurrency market movements through his policies and speeches declaring ambitious crypto goals.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation drops most ambitious roadmap in years, targets finality in seconds by 2029
item.description: The "strawmap" outlines seven forks through the end of the decade, including post-quantum cryptography, shielded transfers, and a 480x reduction in transaction finality time.

item.title: Telegram‚Äôs in-app crypto wallet to offer yield on Bitcoin, Ether and USDt
item.description: Telegram‚Äôs crypto wallet introduces self-custodial vaults, letting users earn yields on Bitcoin, Ether and USDt directly inside the messaging app.

item.description: It was a green day for stablecoin enthusiasts and crypto majors, and positive earnings from NVDA after hours signal the rally may have legs.

item.title: Indiana prepares to put bitcoin in its public retirement plans
item.description: Lawmakers pass HB 1042 allowing public funds to access bitcoin and ETFs, while banning crypto ATMs amid rising fraud concerns.

item.title: Trump family-linked American Bitcoin posts $59 million Q4 loss as bitcoin price slides
item.description: The bitcoin mining company now holds over 6,000 BTC, with roughly one-third acquired through mining and two-thirds through open-market purchases and strategic transactions.

item.description: The roadmap targets faster finality, native privacy, quantum-resistant cryptography, and gigagas throughput across planned upgrades.
